ru.yandex.subtitles.ui.adapter

Class AbstractListAdapter<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • ru.yandex.subtitles.ui.adapter.AbstractListAdapter<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NavigationMenuListAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractListAdapter<E>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Base adapter class that simplifies working with ListView.
